articles.author: Steve Gardner
articles.title: Novak Djokovic pushes past Carlos Alcaraz into Australian Open semifinals - USA TODAY
articles.description: In a matchup more appropriate for a final, 10-time Australian Open champion Novak Djokovic prevails in four sets over reigning Wimbledon champ.
articles.content:
In a heavyweight match more appropriate for the final, Novak Djokovic outlasted Carlos Alcaraz at the Australian Open on Tuesday, keeping him on track for a record 25th Grand Slam singles title.
